mapper.insert: insert into cn_company (id, name, abbr, industry, establish_time, province, city, district, address, official_web, product, introducation, create_time, update_time, logo ) values (#{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{abbr,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{industry,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{establishTime,jdbcType=DATE}, #{province,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{city,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{district,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{address,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{officialWeb,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{product,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{introducation,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{logo,jdbcType=VARCHAR} )
